$interpreted: Soldier: Get up! Time to switch cells!
Sione: It's the middle of the night, why do we have to move at this hour...besides, we've done this multiple times already.
Soldier: Orders of His Majesty Theodore, you do as you're told! Quit talking!
Soldier: Waahhhhh! Who asked you to suddenly stand up like that!? Stay away from me!
Crushfang: ......
Soldier: Whew, scared the living daylights out of me! Heard rumors, but Bears really do tower over us human folks...
Low-key Soldier: ...Must report back to His Majesty, make haste.
Soldier: Alright! We move now, okay!? What a wuss...
Crushfang: ...Trying to avoid attention, huh?
Sione: Eh?
Crushfang: Officer Sione, as long as you and I stay in captivity, the Aldric family and the Bear tribe will have their hands tied.
Crushfang: Theodore has many tricks up his sleeve that only he can use, but taking hostages is not one of them. If we are of such importance, others can do the same.
Sione: Do the same...are you saying, that Theodore is concerned we might fall into the hands of those who oppose him?
Crushfang: The Princess may never question those around her. But Theodore, the man who trusts no one? He absolutely will.
Sione: So all this constant cell-switching in the hours of darkness was to...
Soldier: AHHH!!!
Low-key Soldier: ...was to make it difficult to locate the whereabouts of Miss and the Chieftain. Fortunately, we defied the odds and completed our mission.
Low-key Soldier: We have allies stationed outside ready to go. Both of you, please hurry and come this way!
Sione: You are here on my family's orders?
Sione: Sending escorts to rescue me, must be brother's decision again. Bet he never gave thought about how this will affect his status within the household...
Crushfang: Officer Sione, so are we leaving or not?
Sione: ...Of course, we're leaving!
Soldier: HALT!
Low-key Soldier: Their reinforcements are coming soon, please leave now!
Sione: Got it!
Soldier: The prisoners have escaped, after them!
Pang: Careful there. Don't want to re-injure that neck again, do you?
Sharice: Ok, ok, I know!
Sharice: (It's been two days since I left, everyone must be worried sick. Got to get back asap, while these guys aren't paying attention...)
Pang: Oh right. When are your comrades coming to get you?
Sharice: How, how did you......
Pang: Military uniform and wandering around alone, both rare sights to see around these places. Not too hard to put two and two together.
Puggi: Quite the reaction. Looks like you've being having quite a good time here, didn't want to leave~
Sharice: That, that's not true!

Sharice: ...You have no idea how badly I want to leave here!
It's just that every time I try to leave, this meatball keeps getting in the way!
Pang: Huh...you're not very a thoughtful person, are you? Always trying to be brave, why not speak what your heart truly desires?
Sharice: T-T-Trying? I-I am not! This is just who I am!
Puggi: Is that so? Yet I feel underneath that facade of yours, your true self constantly peeks through~ You're exactly what they call a "Tsundere"~
Puggi: Whoa, even if I did hit the bullseye, there's no need to react so violently!
Sharice: I'm not trying to be brave! This is just my personality! You have no idea how popular I am in the army!
Puggi: KYAAAAAA!!!
Pang: Huh, strange...
Pang: You came here through the frogodile grounds, the most volatile of places around the lake, and have yet to return after so many days and nights.
Pang: If they truly cared for you, someone should have come looking for you by now...
Sharice: ……….
Puggi: Speak of the devil, this little fella said that a bunch of humans are stomping their way across the yard right now!
Sharice: Haha, it's definitely my comrades who are here to take me home!
Pang: Eh, wait a minute......
Jerome: ...This should be the safest route. Why are there still so many beasts and brutes around these parts!?
Jerome: Whew~ Finally got rid of them.
Jerome: Sharice has been missing for days already. Did she really...
Irritated Soldier: Who cares. Don't give a damn about a spoilsport like her!
Unhappy Soldier: Always trying to grab the spotlight and taking credit for every little thing. Good riddance.
Sharice: What!?
Jerome: So you're alive and well?
Sharice: You...so you guys always hated me? I thought we were friends...
Puggi: Hoho, so these people want dear Sharice to be dead not alive. Such malicious intentions!
Pang: Their intentions were quite obvious from the start, when they let you wander in solitude over these uncharted and dangerous lands.
Puggi: This is outrageous! Pang, give them a good butt-kicking with your mighty paws!
Pang: Puggi!
Sharice: (... I have no place in my own family...that's why I joined the army, searching and screaming for a chance, any chance to prove my worth...)
Sharice: (I've tried so hard, why...)
Jerome: Sharice, are you hallucinating? Help us stop this Beast at once!
Sharice: (... No! I must secure the army's good graces, or else I have nowhere to call home...)
Sharice: I was waiting for your orders, Boss!
Sharice: The Lake Island right ahead, you wouldn't believe your eyes! If we offered such promised land to His Majesty Theodore, he'd be so overjoyed!
Puggi: Whoa, biting the hand that feeds!
Sharice: What, that's the best you got? If you guys surrender, I'll be lenient and let you go!
Sharice: (Please, just go. I don't want to hurt you guys...)
Pang: ……….

Jerome: His Majesty Theodore issued an emergency order,
requesting all forces to return to the Kingdom immediately?
Sharice: Has something major happened? If that's the case, this won't do! Boss, we must return this instant!
Jerome: ………
Jerome: Priorities are priorities. This side mission of scouting Maple Lake can wait. Men, head back to Kingdom of the Sun immediately!
Sharice: Whew~ Saved by the bell.
Puggi: Hehe, so that's what you truly meant to say~
Pang: So you were indeed going easy on us back there.
Sharice: It, it's not like that! I am the greatest after all; I don't have the time and interest to fight you guys...
Sharice: Next time we meet, I will definitely kick all of your bum-bums, hard!
Puggi: EHHHH, you leaving now, sweet pea?
Sharice: Of course I am. Where else could I go?
Pang: Isn't staying here an option worth considering as well?
Puggi: That's right. Besides, I wouldn't feel at ease once you're gone; I've grown accustomed to your snarky remarks~
Pang: However, it would be nice if you could just be yourself, without trying to pretend.
Sharice: Shut up! Shut up! Shut up!
Pang: ...Walked away without even looking back, huh.
Puggi: Sad to see her go? It's not too late to chase after her, you know~? She might change her mind and stay.
Pang: Not wise. One's own demons can only be overcome by oneself. I had to go through this, so does she...
Puggi: You sure? No regrets? You don't come across pretty gals like her all the time~
Pang: ......Another word and you go swimming.
Puggi: Awww, don't be mad~ aren't we brothers~
Puggi: Although, I do suppose it's for the best~
Puggi: Nobody can threaten my position as your partner in crime...
Puggi: ...not even a hot chick like that!
Pang: ......Eh?

Model.Text: Get up! Time to switch cells!
It's the middle of the night, why do we have to move at this hour...besides, we've done this multiple times already.
Orders of His Majesty Theodore, you do as you're told! Quit talking!
Waahhhhh! Who asked you to suddenly stand up like that!? Stay away from me!
Whew, scared the living daylights out of me! Heard rumors, but Bears really do tower over us human folks...
...Must report back to His Majesty, make haste.
Alright! We move now, okay!? What a wuss...
...Trying to avoid attention, huh?
Eh?
Officer Sione, as long as you and I stay in captivity, the Aldric family and the Bear tribe will have their hands tied.
Theodore has many tricks up his sleeve that only he can use, but taking hostages is not one of them. If we are of such importance, others can do the same.
Do the same...are you saying, that Theodore is concerned we might fall into the hands of those who oppose him?
The Princess may never question those around her. But Theodore, the man who trusts no one? He absolutely will.
So all this constant cell-switching in the hours of darkness was to...
AHHH!!!
...was to make it difficult to locate the whereabouts of Miss and the Chieftain. Fortunately, we defied the odds and completed our mission.
We have allies stationed outside ready to go. Both of you, please hurry and come this way!
You are here on my family's orders?
Sending escorts to rescue me, must be brother's decision again. Bet he never gave thought about how this will affect his status within the household...
Officer Sione, so are we leaving or not?
...Of course, we're leaving!
HALT!
Their reinforcements are coming soon, please leave now!
Got it!
The prisoners have escaped, after them!
Careful there. Don't want to re-injure that neck again, do you?
Ok, ok, I know!
(It's been two days since I left, everyone must be worried sick. Got to get back asap, while these guys aren't paying attention...)
Oh right. When are your comrades coming to get you?
How, how did you......
Military uniform and wandering around alone, both rare sights to see around these places. Not too hard to put two and two together.
Quite the reaction. Looks like you've being having quite a good time here, didn't want to leave~
That, that's not true!

...You have no idea how badly I want to leave here!
It's just that every time I try to leave, this meatball keeps getting in the way!
Huh...you're not very a thoughtful person, are you? Always trying to be brave, why not speak what your heart truly desires?
T-T-Trying? I-I am not! This is just who I am!
Is that so? Yet I feel underneath that facade of yours, your true self constantly peeks through~ You're exactly what they call a "Tsundere"~
Whoa, even if I did hit the bullseye, there's no need to react so violently!
I'm not trying to be brave! This is just my personality! You have no idea how popular I am in the army!
KYAAAAAA!!!
Huh, strange...
You came here through the frogodile grounds, the most volatile of places around the lake, and have yet to return after so many days and nights.
If they truly cared for you, someone should have come looking for you by now...
Speak of the devil, this little fella said that a bunch of humans are stomping their way across the yard right now!
Haha, it's definitely my comrades who are here to take me home!
Eh, wait a minute......
...This should be the safest route. Why are there still so many beasts and brutes around these parts!?
Whew~ Finally got rid of them.
Sharice has been missing for days already. Did she really...
Who cares. Don't give a damn about a spoilsport like her!
Always trying to grab the spotlight and taking credit for every little thing. Good riddance.
What!?
So you're alive and well?
You...so you guys always hated me? I thought we were friends...
Hoho, so these people want dear Sharice to be dead not alive. Such malicious intentions!
Their intentions were quite obvious from the start, when they let you wander in solitude over these uncharted and dangerous lands.
This is outrageous! Pang, give them a good butt-kicking with your mighty paws!
Puggi!
(... I have no place in my own family...that's why I joined the army, searching and screaming for a chance, any chance to prove my worth...)
(I've tried so hard, why...)
Sharice, are you hallucinating? Help us stop this Beast at once!
(... No! I must secure the army's good graces, or else I have nowhere to call home...)
I was waiting for your orders, Boss!
The Lake Island right ahead, you wouldn't believe your eyes! If we offered such promised land to His Majesty Theodore, he'd be so overjoyed!
Whoa, biting the hand that feeds!
What, that's the best you got? If you guys surrender, I'll be lenient and let you go!
(Please, just go. I don't want to hurt you guys...)

His Majesty Theodore issued an emergency order,
requesting all forces to return to the Kingdom immediately?
Has something major happened? If that's the case, this won't do! Boss, we must return this instant!
Priorities are priorities. This side mission of scouting Maple Lake can wait. Men, head back to Kingdom of the Sun immediately!
Whew~ Saved by the bell.
Hehe, so that's what you truly meant to say~
So you were indeed going easy on us back there.
It, it's not like that! I am the greatest after all; I don't have the time and interest to fight you guys...
Next time we meet, I will definitely kick all of your bum-bums, hard!
EHHHH, you leaving now, sweet pea?
Of course I am. Where else could I go?
Isn't staying here an option worth considering as well?
That's right. Besides, I wouldn't feel at ease once you're gone; I've grown accustomed to your snarky remarks~
However, it would be nice if you could just be yourself, without trying to pretend.
Shut up! Shut up! Shut up!
...Walked away without even looking back, huh.
Sad to see her go? It's not too late to chase after her, you know~? She might change her mind and stay.
Not wise. One's own demons can only be overcome by oneself. I had to go through this, so does she...
You sure? No regrets? You don't come across pretty gals like her all the time~
......Another word and you go swimming.
Awww, don't be mad~ aren't we brothers~
Although, I do suppose it's for the best~
Nobody can threaten my position as your partner in crime...
...not even a hot chick like that!

home!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_12_002","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Eh, wait a minute......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_13_000","SpeakerName":"Jerome","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0048","IconName":"h0048s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...This should be the safest route. Why are there still so many beasts and brutes around these parts!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_13_001","SpeakerName":"Jerome","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0048","IconName":"h0048s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Whew~ Finally got rid of them.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_13_002","SpeakerName":"Jerome","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0048","IconName":"h0048s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sharice has been missing for days already. Did she really...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_13_003","SpeakerName":"Irritated Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0055c2","IconName":"h0055c2_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Who cares. Don't give a damn about a spoilsport like her!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_13_004","SpeakerName":"Unhappy Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0055c2","IconName":"h0055c2_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Always trying to grab the spotlight and taking credit for every little thing. Good riddance.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_13_005","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_14_000","SpeakerName":"Jerome","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0048","IconName":"h0048s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So you're alive and well?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_14_001","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You...so you guys always hated me? I thought we were friends...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_14_002","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hoho, so these people want dear Sharice to be dead not alive. Such malicious intentions!","sfxName":"b0037_story_020","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_14_003","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Their intentions were quite obvious from the start, when they let you wander in solitude over these uncharted and dangerous lands.","sfxName":"t0017_story_004","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_14_004","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This is outrageous! Pang, give them a good butt-kicking with your mighty paws!","sfxName":"b0037_story_007","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_14_005","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Puggi!","sfxName":"t0017_story_012","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_15_000","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(... I have no place in my own family...that's why I joined the army, searching and screaming for a chance, any chance to prove my worth...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_15_001","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(I've tried so hard, why...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_15_002","SpeakerName":"Jerome","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0048","IconName":"h0048s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sharice, are you hallucinating? Help us stop this Beast at once!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_15_003","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(... No! I must secure the army's good graces, or else I have nowhere to call home...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I was waiting for your orders, Boss!","sfxName":"h0138_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_16_001","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The Lake Island right ahead, you wouldn't believe your eyes! If we offered such promised land to His Majesty Theodore, he'd be so overjoyed!","sfxName":"h0138_story_004","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_16_002","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Whoa, biting the hand that feeds!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What, that's the best you got? If you guys surrender, I'll be lenient and let you go!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Please, just go. I don't want to hurt you guys...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_17_002","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2026\u2026\u2026.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Jerome","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0048","IconName":"h0048s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"His Majesty Theodore issued an emergency order,\nrequesting all forces to return to the Kingdom immediately?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Has something major happened? If that's the case, this won't do! Boss, we must return this instant!","sfxName":"h0138_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Jerome","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0048","IconName":"h0048s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2026\u2026\u2026","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_19_002","SpeakerName":"Jerome","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0048","IconName":"h0048s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Priorities are priorities. This side mission of scouting Maple Lake can wait. Men, head back to Kingdom of the Sun immediately!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Whew~ Saved by the bell.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hehe, so that's what you truly meant to say~","sfxName":"b0037_story_024","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So you were indeed going easy on us back there. ","sfxName":"t0017_story_025","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_20_003","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It, it's not like that! I am the greatest after all; I don't have the time and interest to fight you guys...","sfxName":"h0138_story_010_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_20_004","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Next time we meet, I will definitely kick all of your bum-bums, hard!","sfxName":"h0138_story_015","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"EHHHH, you leaving now, sweet pea?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Of course I am. Where else could I go?","sfxName":"h0138_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Isn't staying here an option worth considering as well?","sfxName":"t0017_story_017","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_21_003","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That's right. Besides, I wouldn't feel at ease once you're gone; I've grown accustomed to your snarky remarks~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_21_004","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"However, it would be nice if you could just be yourself, without trying to pretend.","sfxName":"t0017_story_020","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_21_005","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Shut up! Shut up! Shut up!","sfxName":"h0138_story_008","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Walked away without even looking back, huh. ","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sad to see her go? It's not too late to chase after her, you know~? She might change her mind and stay.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Not wise. One's own demons can only be overcome by oneself. I had to go through this, so does she...","sfxName":"t0017_story_020","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You sure? No regrets? You don't come across pretty gals like her all the time~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......Another word and you go swimming.","sfxName":"t0017_story_011","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_23_003","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Awww, don't be mad~ aren't we brothers~","sfxName":"b0037_story_010","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_23_004","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Although, I do suppose it's for the best~","sfxName":"b0037_story_024","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_23_005","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Nobody can threaten my position as your partner in crime...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_23_006","SpeakerName":"Puggi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/b0037","IconName":"b0037s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...not even a hot chick like that!","sfxName":"b0037_story_014","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_014_005_dialog_english##_23_007","SpeakerName":"Pang","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0017","IconName":"t0017s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......Eh?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
